trade_desk.title: Trade Desk
trade_desk.text: Invest in crypto anytime, anywhere with our safe, secure, and easy to use online platform

coinFlip_ATMs.title: CoinFlip ATMs
coinFlip_ATMs.text: We have thousands of ATMs located across the U.S. where you can easily convert cash to crypto

CoinFlip_Wallet.title: CoinFlip Wallet
CoinFlip_Wallet.text: Store your growing investments in our non-custodial wallet that gives you access to a full suite of DeFi services in one place
